hex.description: a Hex representation of the ICAO 24-bit address of the aircraft

type.description: The source protocol/message type that was used to get the aircraft infomation

r.title: registration
r.description: The aircraft registration from the database of the providing service

t.description: Aircraft Type from the database, typically the model minus the manufacturer name e.g. A320

desc.description: The longer name of the aircraft including manu. e.g. Airbus A320

alt_baro.description: the barometric altitude, will be a number or Ground

track.description: true track over ground in degrees (0-359)

roll.description: The roll of the aircraft in °, can be positive and negitive

mag_heading.description: Heading, degrees clockwise from magnetic north

true_heading.description: Heading, degrees clockwise from true north (usually only transmitted on ground, in the air usually derived from the magnetic heading using magnetic model WMM2020)

baro_rate.description: Rate of change of barometric altitude, feet/minute

geom_rate.description: Rate of change of geometric (GNSS / INS) altitude, feet/minute

squawk.description: Mode A code (Squawk), encoded as 4 octal digits

emergency.description: ADS-B emergency/priority status, a superset of the 7×00 squawks (2.2.3.2.7.8.1.1) (none, general, lifeguard, minfuel, nordo, unlawful, downed, reserved)

category.description: emitter category to identify particular aircraft or vehicle classes (values A0 – D7)

nav_altitude_mcp.description: selected altitude from the Mode Control Panel / Flight Control Unit (MCP/FCU) or equivalent equipment

rr_lat.description: If no ADS-B or MLAT position available, a rough estimated position for the aircraft based on the receiver’s estimated coordinates.

rr_lon.description: If no ADS-B or MLAT position available, a rough estimated position for the aircraft based on the receiver’s estimated coordinates.

rc.description: Radius of Containment, meters; a measure of position integrity derived from NIC & supplementary bits

seen_pos.description: How long ago (in seconds before “now”) the position was last updated

nic_baro.description: Navigation Integrity Category for Barometric Altitude

sil_type.description: Interpretation of SIL: unknown, perhour, persample

spi.description: Flight status special position identification bit

mlat.description: List of fields derived from MLAT data

tisb.description: List of fields derived from TIS-B data

messages.description: Total number of Mode S messages received from this aircraft

seen.description: How long ago (in seconds before “now”) a message was last received from this aircraft

rssi.description: Recent average RSSI (signal power), in dbFS; this will always be negative.
